title: simple font ID
content:
Please help me identify this font. It is not Meta. Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203185456im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/type-id_5620.jpg)

 [‹ Serif font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203185456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39232 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font used by Saul Bass, in "The man with the golden arm" poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203185456/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39220 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jleatherman

comments.content: [Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203185456/http:/www.identifont.com/show?3IC) is the link. It’s an Apple.
That would be it. Thank you!
